safire.learning.interfaces.pretrained_supervised_model_handle module¶

class safire.learning.interfaces.pretrained_supervised_model_handle.PretrainedSupervisedModelHandle(model_instance, train, validate, test, run, pretrain)[source]¶

Bases: safire.learning.interfaces.model_handle.ModelHandle

Provides the train/validate/test handle for a learner class. This is, so far, just a wrapper for the model plus output of the ModelClass.setup() function.

A handle is the “runnable” interface to a model.
